Comment: As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)  In general, be courteous to others. Comment: Kristi Noem - [who whined because she was too dense to follow basic tax laws (or just flat out lied) ](https://inequality.org/article/kristi-noem-fudging-estate-taxes-cashing-3-7-million-taxpayer-funded-farm-subsidies/)even though [her mother cashed a fat enough check to pay the tax off apparently](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/the-real-story-behind-kristi-noems-death-tax-ordeal_n_5a3c1874e4b06d1621b2fe00) \- moves from being an entitled attempt at a tax dodger feeding off government subsidies, to [pissing off her own constituents](https://southdakotasearchlight.com/2024/03/13/noem-slings-accusations-about-tribes-while-signing-education-bills/) by claiming their leaders are profiting off fentanyl trafficking with zero evidence, to [murdering pets she can't control](https://southdakotasearchlight.com/2024/05/01/puppy-killing-kristi-noem-may-have-brought-us-together/) \- to being the poster child for stupidity in Homeland Security to [knowing zero muzzle control](https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-14584887/kristi-noem-video-holding-gun-wrong-reactions.html).   I think that's enough of a background on her for most to stomach.  Go take another photo op in El Salvador, and this time stay there.
Author: jlaine
